title: Where I'm from
description: I grew up in the Alberta Prairies, but I have also lived in three other parts of the world. Can you guess where they are by the flower that symbolizes them? (they are tulips for Amsterdam, trillium for Toronto, and cherry blossoms for Nanjing.)

title: Where I've been
description: Iâ€™ve eaten across more than 60 cities spanning over 5 continents. My deep appreciation for the world stems from the international community I grew up in, where there's always an excuse to celebrate cultures through food.

title: Things I love
description: The Rockies, leather-bound journals, chocolate-dipped ice cream, my cats, smelling flowers, reading a good book, scrapbooking paper, and stores that sell paper, just to name a few.
